description.displayText: Debbie has been our full time nanny for almost 3 years. She is very nurturing, patient and has a very positive attitude. She is naturally gifted with children and is able to tackle every situation with a lot of maturity. She has great values. I feel that my daughter is very safe with her. She is very dependable and extremely flexible with her schedule and with the needs of the family she is working for. She has become a part of our family. I usually do not write in reviews, but Debbie is an exceptional nanny and any family would be happy with the decision to hire her.

description.displayText: Debbie was a pleasure to interview. Very outgoing and experienced. She'd make a wonderful nanny.
description.originalText: Debbie was a pleasure to interview. Very outgoing and experienced. She'd make a wonderful nanny.

description.displayText:
Well, she's very jolly! She knows how to take care of the baby, which surprised me because at that time she was younger, and now she has a kid of her own. And when I see the kid I say "Wow! You are doing a good job with that child." She knows how to teach them manners, patience and understanding. 

(To listen to a recording of this interview, click on the References tab above.)
